title: Setting Up shadcn/ui Components in the Construct Project
description: Setup shadcn/ui components in the construct project as a shared package to support VTable component implementation.

migrationPlan.overview: Create a new UI package in the construct project with shadcn/ui components, mirroring the structure and functionality of the mcp-vtable UI package.

steps.description: Create a new UI package directory structure in packages/ui/
Create package.json with necessary dependencies and exports configuration
Add required shadcn/ui components, starting with Table components
Add other required components like Button, Input, Label, Popover, Select, etc.
Add base styles and reusable utilities from the source UI package

openQuestions: Should we use the same component styles and configuration as the source project?
Are there any specific customizations needed for the construct project design system?
Should we implement all shadcn/ui components or only the ones needed for VTable?
